messages.content: U: Build a short spec titled 'spec — Northwind' covering a test scenario; export as md. A: Thanks. Keep it minimal or add more detail? U: Minimal spec is fine; three sections only.

Title: spec — Northwind Sections: - Overview: Goal: set expectations for Northwind. Summary: a short view of a test scenario. - Scope: Assumptions are placeholders for now. Out of scope: real-world specifics. - Timeline: Timeline: the next window. Decision: proceed if aligned.
